tool.name: OGS: Raster2Mesh
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'Raster2Mesh'.

param.name: arrayname
param.label: arrayname
param.help: the scalar array. Only required if assigning pixel values to cell data has been selected (default name is 'Values').

param.name: pixel_type
param.label: pixel type
param.help: The choice how pixel values should be interpreted by the software: 'elevation' adjusts z-coordinates; 'materials' sets (integer) material IDs; 'scalar' creates a (floating-point) array associated with mesh elements.

param.name: elem_type
param.label: elem type
param.help: The element type used in the resulting OGS mesh.

tool.help: This tool runs the **Raster2Mesh** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
